description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You breathe deeply and exhale powerful energy in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], dealing @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[@actor.flags.pf2e.barbarian.instinct.dragon.damageType]|traits:area-damage] damage to each creature in the area with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC. The damage type matches your instinct's dragon breath, and this action gains the trait of your dragon instinct's tradition.
